charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F , 21:841A=CD.F On or about 4/1/2014 in the county of Andrews in the Western District of Texas, the defendants did Conspire to possess with intent to distribute a quantity of methamphetamine in violation of Title 21 USC 846 &; 841(a)(1)

21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE- defendant, aided and abetted by others, possessed with intent to distribute a controlled substance, which offense involved fifty (50) grams or more of actual methamphetamine, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A), and Title 18, United States Code, Section 2.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered the defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00. Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for 78 months. Upon release, defendant shall be on supervised release for 5 years.
